reviewText: Great Method to lear a lot wonderful techniques from Master Alain Cohen's do it and buy it!

purchased on ebay, and at a discounted price, from what its set to, on their Original site..www.krav-security.com i can tell you, that this is NOT, a good deal for you, who wants high quality instructional training material!  - i am only at disc 3 and aldready i can tell you that 20% of what i have seen aldready, is techniques and moves taken from Brazillian jiu jjitsu! NOT KRAV MAGA! and the quality alone of the scenes demonstrated are of so poor quality, that i can't see how they can advertice this, as a instuctor certificational program with chances of graduating yourself to an officially isrealy krav maga instructor!
the video quality is About 240P!! plus, they advertice the dvds as arabicly dubbed with english subtitles..BUT! most of these subtitles disapear again JUST after they disapeared, so in reality you have abosolutely no way of manage reading them without pausing the screen, which can be very frustrating indeed..! not to mention here yerstoday i tried skibbing ahead, and just insert disc 10 into the dvd player.. and it was all, WITHOUT sound and subtitles!

seirously, how can this be adverticed as quality material?!? this is an outrage!

the boxset is also sold with a BOOK as supplementation to the dvds on ebay! but that doesn't help much.. at all with this low qualitied dvd videos honestly...

i hope this is enough to warn some people, because I feel scammed. this was a waste of time AND money :(. ..and sorry for my bad english everybody!
